channel.title: How can i assign an emote to an npc?
channel.description: how do i assign an emote to a npc? im trying to assign the ork attack emote to an ork, (i made pnpced myself into an ork and tested the emote id, works) so how do i assign it to the npc when it attacks? the walk and defence are assigned, i just need to know how to assign the attack emote
